00001 #include <tcp-layer.h>
00002 
00003 /*
00004  * Initializes a host and send appropriate messages
00005  *
00006  * This function simply zeros out the host state and then
00007  * inits some simple values.
00008  */
00009 
00010 void
00011 tcp_layer_init(tcp_layer_state * SV, xmlNodePtr node, tw_lp * lp)
00012 {
00013   SV->bad_msgs = 0;
00014   SV->cwnd = 1;
00015   SV->ssthresh = TCP_LAYER_SND_WND;
00016   SV->rto = 3;
00017   SV->host = rn_getmachine(lp->id);
00018 
00019   SV->connection = SV->host->conn;
00020   
00021   if(SV->connection > -1) 
00022     {
00023       SV->timer = rn_timer_init(lp, 1);
00024       
00025       if(SV->timer)
00026         {
00027           rn_message *msg;
00028           tcp_layer_message *M;
00029           msg = tw_event_data(SV->timer);
00030           M = rn_message_data(msg);
00031           M->MethodName = STARTUP;
00032           printf("%d %d \n",STARTUP, M->MethodName);
00033         }
00034     }   
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 void
00039 tcp_layer_startup(tcp_layer_state * SV, tw_bf * CV, rn_message * M, tw_lp * lp)
00040 {
00041   SV->len =  pow(2,31) - 1;      
00042   SV->start_time = 1;
00043 
00044   tcp_layer_util_event(lp, FORWARD, lp->id, SV->connection, 0, 0, 
00045                        TCP_LAYER_TRANSFER_SIZE);
00046   SV->seq_num = g_tcp_layer_mss;
00047   SV->sent_packets++;
00048   
00049    SV->timer = rn_timer_init(lp, SV->rto);
00050    
00051    if(SV->timer){
00052      rn_message *msg;
00053      tcp_layer_message *M;
00054      msg = tw_event_data(SV->timer);
00055      M = rn_message_data(msg);
00056      M->source = SV->connection;
00057      M->seq_num = 0;
00058      M->MethodName = RTO;
00059    }
00060   
00061    
00062   //tcp_util_event(lp, RTO, SV->connection , lp->id, 0, 0, ts + SV->rto);
00063   
00064   SV->rtt_seq = 0;
00065   SV->rtt_time = 0;  
00066 }
00067 
00068 /*
00069  * EventHandler for a Host
00070  */
00071 
00072 void
00073 tcp_layer_event_handler(tcp_layer_state * SV, tw_bf * CV, rn_message * M, tw_lp * lp)
00074 {
00075   tcp_layer_message    *msg;
00076 
00077   msg = rn_message_data(M);
00078   CV = &(msg->CV); 
00079 
00080   *(int *)CV = (int)0;
00081 
00082   
00083   switch (msg->MethodName)
00084     {
00085     case FORWARD:
00086       switch (SV->connection)
00087         {
00088         case -1:
00089           tcp_layer_process_data(SV, CV, M, lp);
00090           break;
00091           
00092         default:
00093           tcp_layer_process_ack(SV, CV, M, lp);
00094           break;
00095         }
00096       break;
00097     case RTO:
00098       tcp_layer_timeout(SV, CV, msg, lp);
00099       break;
00100     case STARTUP:
00101       tcp_layer_startup(SV, CV, M, lp);
00102       break;
00103     default:
00104       tw_error(TW_LOC,
00105                "APP_ERROR(%ld): Invalid MethodName(%d):Time (%f)\n",
00106                lp->id, msg->MethodName, tw_now(lp));
00107     }
00108 }
00109 
00110 /*
00111  * RC EventHandler for a Host
00112  */
00113 
00114 void
00115 tcp_layer_rc_event_handler(tcp_layer_state * SV, tw_bf * CV, rn_message * M, tw_lp * lp)
00116 {
00117   tcp_layer_message    *msg;
00118        
00119   msg = rn_message_data(M);
00120   
00121   CV = &(msg->CV);
00122    switch (msg->MethodName)
00123      {
00124      case FORWARD:
00125        switch (SV->connection)
00126          {
00127          case -1:
00128           tcp_layer_process_data_rc(SV, CV, M, lp);
00129           break;
00130 
00131          default:
00132            tcp_layer_process_ack_rc(SV, CV, M, lp);
00133            break;
00134          }
00135        break;
00136     case RTO:
00137       tcp_layer_timeout_rc(SV, CV, msg, lp);
00138       break;
00139      default:
00140        tw_error(TW_LOC,
00141                 "APP_ERROR(%d): Invalid MethodName(%d):Time (%f)\n",
00142                 lp->id, msg->MethodName, tw_now(lp));
00143      }
00144 }

00146 
00147 void
00148 tcp_layer_final(tcp_layer_state * SV, tw_lp * lp)
00149 {
00150   printf("%ld: TCP bad messages received = %d \n", lp->id, SV->bad_msgs);
00151   g_tcp_layer_stats.sent_packets += SV->sent_packets;
00152   g_tcp_layer_stats.received_packets += SV->received_packets;
00153   g_tcp_layer_stats.timedout_packets += SV->timedout_packets;
00154   
00155   if (SV->connection > -1){
00156     g_tcp_layer_stats.throughput += ((SV->unack / (tw_now(lp) - SV->start_time)) / 1000);
00157     
00158     printf("\nThroughput %f Kbps, Sent Packets %d, Timeouts %d, Cwnd %f\n",
00159            (((SV->unack *(double) 8)/ (tw_now(lp) - SV->start_time)) / 1000) , 
00160            SV->sent_packets, SV->timedout_packets, SV->cwnd);
00161   } 
00162 }
